EmailTemplate.name: Phone Quote Follow-up Proactive (SAP)
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Following up on our call, I created the quotation 1-XXXXXX. I am forwarding the quote directly to your email address in a separate message.
If you have any questions or would like to place an order for this quote, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
